nodes.text: Trek to Tatooine was an "action-adventure" tour package offered by the Star Tours travel agency months after the Battle of Endor. The tour included a flight to Tatooine, and visits to the desert planet's Galactic Zoo and Mos Eisley Cantina. C-3PO and R2-D2, at the time working on preparations for the StarSpeeder 3000 Transport 22 when seeing the advertisement, both agreed that they did not wish to return to Tatooine, although C-3PO did mention that it was "one tour Star Tours can keep" as he didn't want another case of dust contamination.
